welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cascades, where natural beauty and small town charm come together. Get ready to explore our scenic trails, charming shops, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful stay and truly experience all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights, but also serves some international destinations.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport mainly serves international flights, with a few domestic flights as well.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport is used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at DCA, serving mainly regional and commuter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at DCA, serving domestic and international flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at DCA, serving mainly domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a complimentary 45-minute session. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all terminals and throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
